title: Average player age of participating national teams at the 2018 World Cup in Russia
summary: This bar chart has 32 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Average player age in years in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Average player age in years 29.6 is found at Country Costa Rica and the minimum is found at Nigeria where Country is 25.9.
There is a difference of 3.7 between the maximum Country Costa Rica and minimum Country Nigeria.
min_summary: This bar chart has 32 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Average player age in years in each Country on the y axis.
The Average player age in years is highest at Country Costa Rica and lowest at Country Nigeria.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average player age in years for 32 number of Countrys.
The Average player age in years is highest at Country Costa Rica and lowest at Country Nigeria.
Country Nigeria has 1.14 times less Average player age in years than Country Costa Rica which is the highest.
The Country Costa Rica has the highest Average player age in years, followed by Mexico, and Argentina. Down to the Country Nigeria which is the lowest.
Similar Average player age in years is found in Country Sweden, Uruguay, Colombia, and Australia.
Considered together, the average Average player age in years in all 32 Countrys is roughly 27.86.
